result.execSummary:
The defendant Gregory L. Vanthoff was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Shall be paid to the Dodge County Clerk of Courts office within 60 days or as set in payment plan established
Shall undergo and follow through with any counseling as directed by agent, in particular AODA treatment and domestic abuse counseling

Shall have no contact or communication with victim unless approved by agent;  Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.  Defendant shall not consume alcohol or other intoxicants.  Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety.

ADDRESS INFO for Gregory L. Vanthoff

Payment hearing on June 28, 2016 at 08:45 am.
Dodge Cty DNA Proof of Submission

(3:40) Defendant Gregory L. Vanthoff in court, in custody.  Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def. will to plead; State heard on recomm.; Def. heard; victim rights complied with; there is no contact order in place now w/TRO hearing set; Court questions whether victim is aware of State's recomm. since they just gave it to Def. today; recess taken at 3:50; 4:00 Court goes back on the record; no contest plea is entered in both counts; State makes sentencing argument; def makes statement; Court heard and sentence is imposed:

Count 1: Battery/DAA
**W/H - 2 years PO
- absolute sobriety/no drugs
- counseling as deemed appropriate, in partic. AODA and Domestic abuse counseling
- no violent or abusive contact with anyone
- no contact w/victim except as approved by agent
- $343 CC to DC Clerk of Courts
- $200 DNA surcharge and sample

Count 2: 
- 40 days in DCJ w/H&Tr. w/27 days credit
- $343 CC to DC Clerk of Courts
- $200 DNA surcharge and sample

ADDRESS INFO for Gregory L. Vanthoff
Current: 216 W. Center Street, c/o Dodge County Jail, Juneau, WI 53039 United States  (Effective: 12-02-2015)
Prior: 411 Mill St, Fox Lake, WI 53933

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with alleged victim, BJV, dob 12/7/60 or her residence.  Defendant shall not go on the premises at 411 Mill Street, Fox Lake, WI except Defendant may go to the residence at issue one time in the company of a uniformed law enforcement officer to retrieve his/her personal property.  Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.  Defendant shall not possess any firearms.  Defendant shall not consume alcohol or other intoxicants.  Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety  and shall not go upon the premises of any establishment whose primary business activity involves the sale or distribution of alcoholic beverages, including bars, taverns, liquor stores and beer tents.  The Jail shall permit Defendant to make a phone call at the county expense for bail purposes.
